title: Japanese Real Estate Websites to Monitor
description: List of websites for manual property data collection

websitesToMonitor.name: SUUMO
websitesToMonitor.notes: One of the largest property sites, check for new listings every Monday

websitesToMonitor.name: AtHome
websitesToMonitor.notes: Good for detailed property information, check every Wednesday

websitesToMonitor.name: Homes
websitesToMonitor.notes: Good selection of properties, check every Friday

websitesToMonitor.name: REINS (不動産流通機構)
websitesToMonitor.notes: Requires real estate license, but very reliable data if accessible

websitesToMonitor.name: Tokyo Kantei
websitesToMonitor.notes: Good for price trends and market analysis

dataCollectionChecklist: 1. Visit each website on the schedule defined above
2. Use the same search parameters each time (location, price range, property type)
3. For each interesting property, record all details in the Excel template
4. Take screenshots of property listings for reference
5. Note any changes in prices or availability
6. Record market trend observations in the designated sheet
7. Save the updated Excel file with date in the filename
9. Consider hiring a Japanese-speaking assistant for regular monitoring
